DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of vildagliptin 50 mg bid compared to placebo as an add-on therapy to metformin in Chinese patients with T2DM inadequately controlled by metformin alone.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of add-on Therapy With Vildagliptin in Chinese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Inadequately Controlled With Prior Metformin Monotherapy
